name: Ember Rain
description:
In cooperation with two other developers, we started #Games4Australia!

Who are we?
Together with the help from game developers all over the world, we want to raise money and awareness for the fires in Australia by publishing games of which all the profit will go to charities that help Australia!

How can you help?
If you want to contribute, you can of course make a game!
Another way you can help is to share the cause. You can invite people to the discord or share one of the games with other people. As long as the word gets out, you are helping us and our planet!

Lastly, you can help by donating to one of the charities that is involved, like WIRES. WIRES is one of the biggest wildlife rescue services rescuing the animals in Australia right now. Please consider clicking the link below to support them!

DONATE TO WIRES

Where can you find us?

Hashtag: #Games4Australia
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Games4Australia/
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/X2vTrQr
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/games4australia/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/koalafish_stu

Together we can make a change!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Publisher: KoalaFish Studios
Developer: Markreel https://www.instagram.com/markreel.exe/
Artist: Koalaura https://www.instagram.com/koalaura.jpg/
Music: Tim Peeters
